lockYourFareMessage.text: Avianca flights in which Lock and Fly is available
lockYourFareMessage.toolTip: By selecting flights with this icon, you will have the option to pay a fee to lock the mileage shown for 3 days from the reservation date or for as long as 17 days starting today. The mileage selected wonÂ´t go up while you decide. Restrictions apply.
